channel.title: Comments on: rssCloud WordPress Plugin Update – 0.4.1

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/10/29/rsscloud-wordpress-plugin-update-0-4-1/#comment-3116">Matt Terenzio</a>.
Agreed, allowing for domains helps quite a bit.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Matt Terenzio.

Agreed, allowing for domains helps quite a bit.

item.title: By: Matt Terenzio
item.dc:creator: Matt Terenzio
item.description:
That's great news for smaller shared hosting users and the fact that we are allowing domains may also help some larger distributed implementations.
Nice work dude!
item.content:encoded:
That’s great news for smaller shared hosting users and the fact that we are allowing domains may also help some larger distributed implementations.

Nice work dude!
